text: Ariel Rubinstein (born April 13, 1951 in Jerusalem) is an Israeli economist. He is a professor of economics at Tel Aviv University and New York University. Rubinstein writes about game theory. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2012. ==References== ==Other websites== * Ariel Rubinstein's personal homepage with links to most of his published works * The presentation of Ariel Rubinstein for the 2004 Nemmers Prize in Economics. * Nash lecture * Rubinstein's Alternating Offers Bargaining paper * Nash's home page Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli economists Category:Academics of Tel Aviv University Category:Israeli Jews Category:Writers from Jerusalem Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Ariel Rubinstein
